text: Bathysoma lutkeni is an extinct species of lampriform from the Paleocene of Sweden. One specimen is known from a rock from the Lellinge Greensand Formation. == Description == === Appearance === B. lutkeni has a deep body and a tube-like head. However, not really much is known about it. === Classification === B. lutkeni was classified as a menid, then became a snake mackerel. However, scientists soon decided to classify it as basal because it looked way too much like a typical turkmenid. == Related pages == * Turkmenidae == References == Category:Animals of Europe Category:Lampriformes Category:Ray-finned fish Category:Extinct fish
title: Bathysoma
